title: of the National Archives Act 1986 (No. 11 of 1986) (as adapted by the Culture,
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the National Archives Act 1986 (Section
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Archives Act 1986 (Section 

8(1A)) (Transfer of Departmental Records) (No. 2) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited national archive act 1986 (section 8(1a)) (transfer departmental records) (no 2) order 2021

title: of the National Archives Act 1986 (No. 11 of 1986) (as adapted by the Culture,
heading: In this Order –
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order – 

“Act of 1986” means the National Archives Act 1986 (No. 11 of 1986); 

“Departmental records” has the same meaning as it has in the Act of 1986.
text_norm: 2 order - act 1986 mean national archive act 1986 (no 11 1986) departmental record meaning act 1986

title: of the National Archives Act 1986 (No. 11 of 1986) (as adapted by the Culture,
heading: 3. The following class of Departmental records which are less than 30
text_raw:
3. The following class of Departmental records which are less than 30 
years old but more than 20 years old, namely Anglo Irish records relating to the 
peace process and Northern Ireland, including the Good Friday Agreement and 
subsequent agreements, for the period from 1 January 1992 to 31 December 
1998, that are held by the Department of Justice, shall be transferred, in 
accordance with the Act of 1986, to the National Archives. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 10th December, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [679] 3 

The Taoiseach consents to the making of the foregoing Order. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Taoiseach, 

30 November, 2021. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

The Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform consents to the making of the 
foregoing Order. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Public 
Expenditure and Reform, 

2 December, 2021. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

The Minister for Justice consents to the making of the foregoing Order. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 December, 2021. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 December, 2021. 

CATHERINE MARTIN, 

Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and 
Media. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [679]
